faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: We’ve got answers for restaurant owners

0.question: How fast will I see results?
0.answer: Most see more online traffic in 7–14 days. Full impact after 4–6 weeks of steady use.

1.question: Do I need to be a tech pro?
1.answer: No way. We handle everything digital, you just run your business.

2.question: What about my old listings?
2.answer: We optimize your existing profiles – all your reviews and info stay intact.

3.question: Can I cancel anytime?
3.answer: Yes, you’re always in control. Some plans have a 6-month minimum for best pricing.

4.question: How’s the support?
4.answer: You’ll have a dedicated rep – all changes are reviewed with you first.

5.question: Is the first consultation really free?
5.answer: Absolutely – and you’ll get a full strategy, no obligation.

6.question: Is this right for small independents?
6.answer: That’s our sweet spot! Designed for single-location and growing concepts.

7.question: How do I track my success?
7.answer: Monthly reports show your reach, calls, and bookings – you see the ROI every month.
